title: Kalista is now one of the worst ADCs in the game... Perhaps it is time to make her viable again?
body:
As the title says...

{{champion:429}} is currently sitting at a 45% win rate:
http://champion.gg/champion/Kalista/ADC

Buffs:

E: Rend

Rend now stacks infinitely instead of stacking up to 294 times.

R: Fate's Call

**New Effect** Now deals 150/250/350 damage (80% AD scaling)

Cooldown decreased from 150/120/90 to 120/90/60

replies.body:
1. E change is useless, as it is nearly impossible for Kalista to even stack it up to 100 times, let alone 294
2. Her R is already and AoE knockup, it does NOT need damage
Let us also make {{champion:17}} 's shrooms stack again along with their damage.
You have to be careful judging adcs winrates since it's only in comparison to other adcs.

kalista is super strong , and requires a lot of skill.
the win rate being low is cause bad player's where taking advantage of her strengths. and the nerfs made it so they couldn't but good kalista mains can still do the same thing each game and win perfectly fine.
it made her harder to play as her mechanics demand her to be played.
meaning she is where riot wants her to be. hard to learn and new players too her probably wont do good till they master her kit. then they will start to get those nice wins stacking up.
not to mention if you auto attack someone 50-60 times they should be dead without rend.
The amount of people who don't realize this is a shitpost is amazing.

She only needs one kill to start snowballing and carry the game.
She is in a very good spot right now, I would say. 
She just needs a bit of teamwork and coordination.
